channel.title: States on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in States on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Add edit state
item.description: Add edit stateWhile adding or editing a state, the following fields / drop-down / toggle are displayed: Name - this field is mandatory. A tooltip for this field is displayed: “Provide the state name to be displayed in addresses and on invoices.”. When trying to save and if the field is empty, the following error message is displayed: “The name field is required.”. When trying to save and if the field is invalid, the following error message is displayed: “The name field is invalid.

item.title: States listing
item.description: States Call to actionA call to action button is displayed: Add new state - See the specs of the add edit state Settings wheelWhen clicking on the settings wheel, the following options are displayed: Refresh list After clicking on it, the page is reloaded. Sorts and searches are kept. Show SQL query After clicking on it, the SQL query is displayed in a modal. The SQL query takes into account filters and sorts that have been done.
